dmca.title: To Buy or Not to Buy (Music)
dmca.body:
We are counsel for Direct Response Network and their affiliated companies including BuyMusic.Com and Buy.Com. 

You are providing hosting and domain name services for the following website:

<http://www.dontbuymusic.com> , which resolves to 216.171.238.76

This website constitutes direct copies and defacements of numerous copyrights and trademarks containing the html code, graphics, photographs, sounds, logos etc. created by and owned by www.buymusic.com. They also removed the owner's actual copyright notice and substituted a false notice, a further violation of the Act.

You are hereby notified of violations of the copyright act and trademark act on this website on your system, and by virtue of this notice failure promptly to permanently remove will result in a willful violation.

Luce, Forward, Hamilton & Scripps LLP
[Private]
San Diego, CA 92130-2592
[Private]
[Private] Fax
dmca.principal_name: Direct Response Network and their affiliated companies including BuyMusic.Com and Buy
